Divide Style

# Divide Style

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

CAUTION

`Divide Style` was temporary removed in `v4`. We are working to re-add it in the future.

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support     |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
divide-solid
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
divide-dashed
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
divide-dotted
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
divide-none
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
divide-double
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
divide-hidden
``` | 🌐 Web only |
